com.attivio.util

Interface StatusListener


  • public interface StatusListener
    Accepts status messages for various system or client events.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void debug(String msg, Object... params)
      Logs a debug message.
      void error(ErrorCode errorCode, Throwable ex, String msg, Object... params)
      Logs an error message with an error code.
      void info(String msg, Object... params)
      Logs an info message.
      void warn(AttivioException ae)
      Log an AttivioException at a warning level.
      void warn(ErrorCode logMessageType, String msg, Object... params)
      Logs a warning message with an error code.
      void warn(ErrorCode logMessageType, Throwable t, String msg, Object... params)
      Logs a warning message without an error code.
